data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Scherz, Mark D., Koehler, Joern, Vences, Miguel, Glaw, Frank (2019): A new yellow-toed Platypelis species (Anura, Microhylidae, Cophylinae) from the Maroantsetra region, northeastern Madagascar. Evolutionary Systematics 3 (1): 75-83, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/evolsyst.3.33417, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/evolsyst.3.33417
